titleStmt.title: A Most strange and dreadful apparition of several spirits & visions at several times seen and spoken to, on the 14, 15, and 16th of this instant July, 1680, at the house of Mr. John Thomas, Junior, next door to the Sign of the Crown, at Cow Cross, in the parish of St. Sepulchres, London ... : with many more circumstances not here related, but will be certainly justified for truths, by the (credible) spectators.

A Most strange and dreadful apparition of several spirits & visions at several times seen and spoken to, on the 14, 15, and 16th of this instant July, 1680, at the house of Mr. John Thomas, Junior, next door to the Sign of the Crown, at Cow Cross, in the parish of St. Sepulchres, London ... : with many more circumstances not here related, but will be certainly justified for truths, by the (credible) spectators.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, with print showthrough and slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
